Description.Text: Situated in Urgup, this hotel is 0.4 mi (0.6 km) from Temenni Wishing Well and within 6 mi (10 km) of Sunset Point and Ortahisar Castle. Rose Valley and Goreme Open Air Museum are also within 6 mi (10 km). Hotel have 7 rooms that provide conveniences like sofa beds and coffee makers, plus free Wi-Fi and balconies. The hotel has a bar/lounge and coffee/tea in the lobby. Free Wi-Fi in public areas and free valet parking are also provided. Other amenities include 24-hour room service, concierge services, and dry cleaning.
